Movie inspired by the gelijknamige medieval sage concerning an unsuccessful sailor who is doomed up to in all perpetuity the world seas to navigate. The film tells the tale in three companies of a villein which goes, against the background of the eighty-year-old war, in search to its alleged father, the flying Dutchman, and with that to itself.
